summary: The federal government awards billions of dollars in grants to state and local governments each year for everything from children's health insurance to higher education. We looked at the training federal grants managers receive at selected agencies. We found that while agencies provided some training and the Office of Management and Budget developed some career assistance resources, none had evaluated the effectiveness of their efforts...
title: Grants Workforce: Actions Needed to Ensure Staff Have Skills to Administer and Oversee Federal Grants
